segments.text: Wasn't that a great flick ? I was on the edge of my seat through the whole movie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would say it was a typical run-of-the-mill Hollywood thriller .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'm no movie expert , but those special effects were impressive by any standards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Special effects ? Baloney ! That movie was made on a shoestring budget . They've been using trick photography like that for years
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . But you have to admit that it was an exciting story , especially with that surprise ending .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should read the book . The original story is much better and has a different twist at the end .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , really ? How does the book end ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Read it yourself and find out !
segments.speaker: S2
